rowtype.html: <textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Country.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textarea">%language</textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Full name.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera">%name %lastname</textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Address.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Address.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="ZIP code.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="City.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Region.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera"></textarea><textarea class="text-address" placeholder="Phone.." onfocus="this.value='';" id="country-textaera"></textarea>
